include(ExternalProject)

ExternalProject_Add(libpng
    PREFIX ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}
    SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../externals/libpng
    BINARY_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}
    INSTALL_DIR ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}
    CMAKE_ARGS -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR} -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE} -DCMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE=ON -DPNG_STATIC=ON -DPNG_SHARED=OFF
)
